traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hoplite has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hoplite's allies is within 5 feet of the hoplite and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The hoplite makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6 damage) poison damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6 damage) poison damage.
